video_description: - Permission to use granted by HTC Taiwan - http://www.netbooknews.com/22738/htc-flyer-official-video-out/ - The official presentation and demo of the new HTC Flyer 7-inch tablet runnning on the new 1.5Ghz Qualcomm Snapdragon processor.

comments.text: Apple never gets killed. As long as Steve Jobs is alive, Apple can go on and be a strong competitor﻿ no matter the limitations the products have. comments.text: Apple﻿ may "fail" to you. It will ALWAYS be a fierce competitor. An as an Apple fan, I recognize that this tablet is really something. The Flash, the pen, the recording, the gaming. Apple doesn't fail, it might fail if Steve Jobs dies, he saved Apple from bankruptcy.

comments.text: Yes this tablet computer has a Micro SD card slot. It comes with 32GB of internal storage, with a Micro SD card slot that supports Micro SD cards up to﻿ 32 additional GB, to make a maximum total of 64GB of on board storage.
